# allowReadOnly

**Type Property**

An option that allows the participant to grant other participants read-only permissions.

## Declaration

```swift
static var allowReadOnly: NSSharingService.CloudKitOptions { get }
```

## CloudKit Options

- **allowPrivate**: An option that allows the participant to privately distribute the share to other iCloud users.
- **allowPublic**: An option that allows the participant to publicly distribute the share to other iCloud users.
- **allowReadWrite**: An option that allows the participant to grant other participants read-write permissions.
- **standard**: An option that allows the participant to configure the share with a standard set of options.
